QuestData.Title: The Short Way Home
QuestData.Description: Looks like your work here is done, $c. You'd better head back to the Crossroads.$B$BLuckily for you, my Silver Bullet X-831 prototype is finished, and she's ready for a test drive. Whaddaya say you do me one last favor and take her for a little spin?$B$BOne of my assistants will accompany you. Your sweet, sweet ride is waiting on the platform behind me. Just hop on when you're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take a ride on the Silver Bullet X-831.
QuestData.RewardText: I thought you were a goner. Glad to see you're still in one piece.
